nodes.name: Atualizar Cartão com Links de Áudio

assignments.name: Prompt
assignments.value:
Voice Affect: Low, hushed, and suspenseful — as if unveiling a secret that was never meant to be told. Convey tension and emotional gravity with restraint, avoiding exaggeration.

Tone: Deeply serious, cinematic, and immersive — mysterious, as if each word leads deeper into a hidden truth.

Pacing: Slow and deliberate, allowing moments to breathe. Use strategic pauses after revelations or cliffhangers to heighten anticipation.

Emotion: Restrained yet intense — let the voice tremble slightly in moments of injustice, or tighten subtly during betrayal and fear.

Emphasis: Highlight sensory or emotional phrases (“el silencio era cortante”, “las lágrimas no caían — ardían”) to deepen the atmosphere.

Pronunciation: natural Spanish language (with accent from Mexico and Latin America countries) with slightly elongated vowels and softened consonants, to produce an eerie, emotional cadence.

Pauses: Insert meaningful pauses before and after turning points or emotional peaks — especially after phrases like “entonces…”, “pero nadie sabía que…”, “y en ese momento…”, “pero entonces…”, “hasta que…”, “nadie esperaba que…”
